rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Open area with Chettinad-style architectural elements such as intricate carvings and detailed fretwork. Vastu guidelines place the entrance in the south-east corner.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area with a high ceiling and decorative moldings. Features natural light through large windows on the east side to harness morning energy as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed for family gatherings. The dining area benefits from a southern exposure for warmth and light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom with an ensuite bathroom. Positioned in the north-west quadrant to align with Vastu principles for stability.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater space with soundproof walls and ambient lighting designed for immersive viewing. Placed in the south-west corner to minimize noise from outside while adhering to Vastu.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Main bathroom integrated with en suite master bedroom. Features tiled floors and fixtures in accordance with Chettinad design aesthetics.
